<title level="1" pfs="">[Ilgreth](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1595)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 50

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 48

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 45
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 20">[Ilgreth](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1595)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +39

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +34, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Plane of Fire Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +39, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +35, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** +10

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, _[major staff of fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=356)_ (arcane focus)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 350

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 4d4+14 piercing

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 44, attack +36
- **Cantrips (10th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)
- **3rd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (×2), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33) (×2), [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)
- **7th**
[Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=100), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369)
- **8th**
[Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95), [Maze](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224) (×2)
- **9th**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) (×3), [Meteor Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=191)
- **10th**
[Cataclysm](/Spells.aspx?ID=32) (×2)

**Wizard School Spells** DC 44, 3 Focus Points
- **10th**
[Elemental Tempest](/Spells.aspx?ID=527), [Force Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=529)

**Arcane Rituals** DC 44

- **2nd**
[Inveigle](/Rituals.aspx?ID=14)
- **8th**
[Imprisonment](/Rituals.aspx?ID=13)

**Drain Bonded Item** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** Ilgreth hasn't acted yet on this turn; **Effect** Ilgreth can cast one prepared spell he has already cast today without spending a spell slot. He must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

**Overwhelming Energy** <actions string="Single Action" />  If Ilgreth's next action is to Cast a Spell, the spell ignores 20 resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage.

</column>
name: Ilgreth
